Dictionary.demo_msg_part3: Si vous n'avez pas de compte Icecat, vous pouvez vous enregistrez gratuitement ici
Dictionary.demo_msg_part1: Vous utilisez actuellement un compte démo. Merci de vous connectez avec votre compte Icecat
Dictionary.demo_insert_desc: Ceci est une demo d'une insersion homegene d'une fiche produit Icecat LIVE pour votre site internet. Imaginez que cette fiche produit est inclue dans la page produit de votre site e-commerce.

GeneralInfo.Title: Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 GT-I8160 9,65 cm (3.8") SIM unique Android 2.3 3G Micro-USB A 2,1 Go 1500 mAh Noir

GeneratedLocalTitle.Value: Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 GT-I8160 9,65 cm (3.8") SIM unique Android 2.3 3G Micro-USB A 2,1 Go 1500 mAh Noir

Description.LongDesc:
Grâce à son puissant processeur double cœur à 800 MHz et à sa connexion HSPA haut débit, vous pouvez jouer, télécharger et surfer sur Internet à une vitesse fulgurante.


Simplement moderne, remarquablement élégant


Le Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 bénéficie d’un design extrêmement fin et raffiné.

- Un design moderne, dans la lignée des précédents Galaxy Ace.
- Une prise en main confortable grâce aux contours arrondis.
- Une épaisseur de seulement 10,85 mm qui vous permet d’emporter votre GSM partout avec vous.


Un puissant processeur double cœur à 800 MHz


Le Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 est équipé d’un puissant processeur double cœur cadencé à 800 MHz pour des performances d’une rapidité époustouflante.

- Ce GSM est suffisamment puissant pour vous permettre d’exécuter les applications les plus exigeantes, le tout sans consommer trop d’énergie.
- Profitez de performances améliorées pour les applications 3D, les jeux et les vidéos.
- Le passage d’un écran à l’autre est fluide et convivial, vous garantissant un confort d’utilisation optimal en mode multitâche.


Une expérience multimédia éblouissante


Le grand écran de 3,8 pouces du Samsung Galaxy Ace vous permet de profiter pleinement de différents types de contenus multimédias avec une excellente qualité d’image.

- Le grand écran offre une qualité d’image exceptionnelle pour une expérience de divertissement plus vraie que nature.
- Prenez encore plus de plaisir à jouer sur votre GSM.
- Profitez d’un confort optimal lors de l’utilisation des applications et de la navigation sur le Web.
- La puissante batterie de 1 500 mAh vous permet de profiter encore plus longtemps de tous vos contenus multimédias.


Une généreuse mémoire pour toutes vos applications préférées


Le Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 dispose d’une grande capacité de mémoire qui vous permet de stocker facilement toutes vos applications préférées.

- Grâce à la généreuse mémoire interne de 4 GB, vous pouvez stocker sur votre GSM toutes les applications que vous avez téléchargées depuis la boutique Google Play.
- Vous pouvez également étendre votre mémoire en ajoutant une carte microSD.
- La connexion HSPA haut débit vous permet de télécharger vos applications préférées en un rien de temps ou de faire des recherches sur le Net à vitesse grand V.


Une interface TouchWiz conviviale


Le Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 est doté d’une interface TouchWiz 4 conviviale pour une navigation encore plus simple et fluide sur votre GSM.

- Utilisez les différents widgets disponibles pour consulter les dernières actualités, la météo, etc. directement sur votre écran d’accueil.
- Personnalisez votre écran d’accueil avec les applications et les fonctions que vous utilisez le plus souvent.
- Commandez votre GSM à l’aide de votre voix grâce à Google Voice.
Description.LongProductName: Galaxy Ace 2 i8160, Android 2.3, EDGE/GPRS, 3.8" TFT 16M, 4 GB, 5 MP, 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth, A-GPS, microSD

SummaryDescription.ShortSummaryDescription: Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 GT-I8160, 9,65 cm (3.8"), 480 x 800 pixels, 2,1 Go, 5 MP, Android 2.3, Noir
SummaryDescription.LongSummaryDescription: Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 GT-I8160. Taille de l'écran: 9,65 cm (3.8"), Résolution de l'écran: 480 x 800 pixels. Famille de processeur: NovaThor, Modèle de processeur: U8500. Capacité de stockage interne: 2,1 Go. Résolution de la caméra arrière (numerique): 5 MP, Type de caméra arrière: Caméra unique. Capacité de la carte SIM: SIM unique. Système d'exploitation installé: Android 2.3. Capacité de la batterie: 1500 mAh. Couleur du produit: Noir. Poids: 118 g

Features.Description: Mesure de la diagonale de l'écran du produit, généralement en pouces.
Résolution de l'écran pour le système.
Technology of touch sensetive screen e.g. dual-touch.
There are a variety of touchscreen technologies that have different methods of sensing touch, including resistive and capacitive.
A family of processors is a group of processors produced by one company over a short period of time e.g. Intel Pentium processors.
The model number for the processor in a computer.
The number of central processing units ('cores') in a processor. Some processors have 1 core, others have 2 (e.g. Intel Core Duo) or more (e.g. the Intel Xeon E7-2850 has 10 cores).
The amount e.g of data which can be stored inside the device.
Types of memory cards which can be used with this product.
The maximum size of memory card that can be used with this device.

Name.Value: Taille maximale de la carte mémoire

Features.Description: The resolution of the images produced with the rear camera, given in MP (megapixel. 1 MP = 1 million pixels).
Indicates the type of the camera at the front of the product, dual or single.
Whether or not the rear camera features its own flash.

This is the maximum frame rate, also known as frame frequency and frames per second (FPS). It is the frequency (rate) at which an imaging device produces unique consecutive images called frames. The term applies equally well to film and video cameras, computer graphics, and motion capture systems. Frame rate is most often expressed in frames per second (FPS) and is also expressed in progressive scan monitors as hertz (Hz).
Indicates the type of the camera at the back of the product, dual or single.
Device focusing a camera or other piece of equipment automatically.
Recording moving visual images.
The product has an integrated camera.
How many SIM cards the device can hold.
Popular technology that allows an electronic device to exchange data or connect to the internet wirelessly using radio waves.

The type of wireless local area network (LAN): ad-hoc (where units in a network communicate peer-to-peer) or Infrastructure (units communicate with each other via an access point).  A LAN interconnects computers in a small area e.g. home, school or office.

Bluetooth is a low-power radio technology developed to replace the cables and wires currently used to link or connect electronic devices such as personal computers, printers, and a wide variety of handheld devices including mobile phones. Because it uses radio-wave connectivity, a Bluetooth-enabled device has a constant, established connection to whatever browser it uses. This saves the user the trouble of logging on to check for emails or news updates, for example.
The type of bluetooth technology in the product e.g. Bluetooth Smart (v4.0).
The type of cellular connection subscription.
The device features a socket into which a USB cable can be plugged.
The type of USB connector/port that this product has.

Universal Serial Bus (USB) is an industry standard developed in the mid-1990s that defines the interface used for connection, communication and power supply between computers and electronic devices. Every new version - for example 1.1, 2.0, 3.0 - is much faster than the previous one.
How headphones connect to a device e.g. wirelessly or via a cable and connector.
Multimedia Messaging Service (MMS) is a standard way to send messages that include multimedia content to and from a mobile phone over a cellular network
Description des caractéristiques visibles du produit.
La couleur, p. ex. rouge, bleu, vert, noir, blanc.
Simultaneous video and audio signals to enable people to talk to and see each other in real time.

Features.PresentationValue: réveil, calculatrice, calendrier, rappel d'évenement, Enregistreur
Features.LocalValue: réveil, calculatrice, calendrier, rappel d'évenement, Enregistreur
Features.Description: You can use your device to manage your information and your time.

Device has a microphone and loudspeaker provided separately from those in the handset. This device allows multiple persons to participate in a conversation. The loudspeaker broadcasts the voice or voices of those on the other end of the telephone line, while the microphone captures all voices of those using the speakerphone.

Global Positioning System (GPS) is a space-based satellite navigation system that provides location and time information in all weather conditions, anywhere on or near the Earth where there is an unobstructed line of sight to four or more GPS satellites. The system provides critical capabilities to military, civil and commercial users around the world. It is maintained by the United States government and is freely accessible to anyone with a GPS receiver.
Whether the navigation system can locate the phone's position.
Frequency-modulated (FM) radio gives the clearest reception of any radio band. When used with a headset, it delivers stereo-like sound.
RDS (Radio Data System) means that information such as time, station identification and programme information can be displayed by the device.

Features.PresentationValue: AAC, AAC+, AMR, eAAC+, FLAC, IMY, MIDI, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA
Features.LocalValue: AAC, AAC+, AMR, eAAC+, FLAC, IMY, MIDI, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA
Features.Description: The audio formats which this device or software can read/use e.g. MP3, MP4.
The type of video formats that can be used by this device.
Description of a technology platform including a processor, chipset, platform software and wired networking capabilities
Type of operating system on a device e.g. IOS on Apple devices, Android for mobile devices.
The type of battery in the device, e.g. nickel–cadmium (NiCd).
A measure of the charge stored by the battery. Determined by the mass of active material contained in the battery.
The time a GSM (smartphone) with a fully-charged battery is expected to last under perfect conditions.
The time a 3G cell/mobile phone  with a fully-charged battery is expected to last under perfect conditions.
The officially quoted longest time that a single battery charge will last when the smartphone is constantly connected to the GSM network but is not in active use.
The officially quoted longest time that a single battery charge will last when the cell/mobile phone is constantly connected to the G3 network but is not in active use.
The device e.g. smartphone, tablet uses gravity to sense whether it should be displaying in portrait or landscape mode.
The measurement or extent of something from side to side.
The distance from the front to the back of something.
Height of the product

Weight of the product without packaging (net weight). If possible, the net weight is given including standard accessories and supplies. Please note that sometimes the manufacturer leaves out the weight of accessories and/or supplies.
Instructions, either online, as a computer program or in paper form, to allow you to set up and start using the product quickly.
The device comes with a headset.
L'écran du téléphone ou de l'ordinateur, etc., qui réagit au toucher pour que vous controliez l'interface en utilisant vos doigts.
Capability of video files playback.

Polyphonic ringing tones are played through a speaker rather than an ordinary buzzer, which means that you get vastly improved sound quality for melodious ringing tones, message alerts, and gaming sounds.
The category of ringer which indicates when someone is phoning you.
Capability to rotate device.
This product includes a camera.

General Packet Radio Service is a wireless data transmission service based on packet transmission. For example, if an email is sent by GPRS it will be reduced into .packets. of information. Each individual packet travels to its destination by the quickest possible route. This means the different packets from the same mail can travel separately through foreign networks around the globe in order to avoid obstructions. At the pre-set destination they are rebuilt and presented to the recipient as a whole. GPRS offers instant access, and permanent connection between the mobile device and the network. With GPRS you only pay for information sent or received, rather than for connection time.
Wireless is a term used to describe telecommunications in which electromagnetic waves (rather than some form of wire) carry the signal over part or all of the communication path.
